mapper.select: SELECT WORK_DATE , BATCH_NO , REF_NO , RULE_CODE , DEPART_ID , RULE_TYPE , UNIT_NAME , UNIT_CODE , RELATION_TYPE , REPORT_DATE , SHADINESS_LEVEL , SHADINESS_DESC , ACTION_MEASURE , ORIG_BATCH_NO , ORIG_WORK_DATE , ORIG_CLIENT_ID , ORIG_REF_NO , ORIG_TRADE_DATE , ORIG_RULE_CODE , REPORT_TYPE , IF_RPT , RPT_STATUS , FINAL_RPT_STATUS , RET_MSE , REPORTER , RPT_FILE , RPT_ZIP , TOTAL_COUNT1 , TOTAL_COUNT2 , SERIAL_NUM_1 , SERIAL_NUM_2 , SERIAL_NUM_3 , IS_DEL , DEL_INFO , MAKE_STATUS , MAKER , MAKE_TIME , CHECK_STATUS , CHECKER , CHECK_TIME , CHECK_INFO , FILLER1 , FILLER2 , FILLER3 , SHADINESS_REP_NAME , SHADINESS_REP_IC_TYPE , SHADINESS_REP_IC_TYPE_MEMO , SHADINESS_REP_IC_NO , SHADINESS_SRD_NAME , SHADINESS_SRD_IC_TYPE , SHADINESS_SRD_IC_TYPE_MEMO , SHADINESS_SRD_IC_NO , RPT_COUNT , SHADINESS_TRPT_POINT , TRAN_CUST_BEHAVIOR , DOUBT_ANALYSIS , SHADINESS_CRIME_TYPE , SHADINESS_TRAN_CODE , RPT_DIR , O_RPT_DIR , O_TRPT_POINT , MAN_CORRECT_FLAG , RPT_DOT_CODE , SERIAL_NUM_4 , SHADINESS_TRPT_POINT_MEMO , ORG_RPT_FILE FROM AML_ANALYSISRESULT WHERE 1 = 1 AND WORK_DATE = #{WORKDATE}

select distinct aml_datasource.WORK_DATE , aml_datasource.REF_NO , aml_datasource.ORIG_REF_NO , aml_datasource.DEPART_ID , SEQ_NO, DEPART_NAME, DEPART_TYPE, DEPART_AREACODE, CLIENT_ID, RULE_CODE, RULE_TYPE, UNIT_NAME, UNIT_CODE , RELATION_TYPE, REPORT_DATE, SHADINESS_LEVEL, SHADINESS_DESC, ACTION_MEASURE, ORIG_BATCH_NO, ORIG_WORK_DATE , ORIG_CLIENT_ID, ORIG_TRADE_DATE, ORIG_RULE_CODE, PCODE, CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_TYPE, CLIENT_IC_TYPE, CLIENT_IC_TYPE_MEMO , CLIENT_IC_NO, CLIENT_NATIONALITY, PHONE, ADDRESS, OTHER_CONTACT, INDUSTRY_TYPE, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, REP_NAME , REP_IC_TYPE, REP_IC_TYPE_MEMO, REP_IC_NO, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_IC_NO, AGENT_IC_TYPE, AGENT_IC_TYPE_MEMO, AGENT_NATIONALITY , ACCT_ID, ACCT_TYPE, ACCT_OPEN_TIME, ACCT_CLOSE_TIME, PBOC_NUM_ACCT, TRADE_DATE, TRADE_TIME, VALUE_DATE, TRADE_VENUE_COUNTRY , TRADE_VENUE_REGION, TRADE_MODE, DEBIT_CREDIT, TRADE_COUNTRY, TRADE_REGION, TRADE_CODE, FUND_USAGE, CURRENCY, AMT, DOLLAR_AMT , CTPY_FI_CODE, CTPY_FI_PCODE, CTPY_FI_NAME, CTPY_FI_TYPE, CTPY_FI_COUNTRY, CTPY_FI_REGION_CODE, CTPY_NAME, CTPY_TYPE, CTPY_NATIONALITY , CTPY_IC_CODE, CTPY_IC_TYPE, CTPY_IC_TYPE_MEMO, CTPY_ACCT_ID, CTPY_ACCT_TYPE, TRADE_TYPE, REPAYMENT_DATE, LOAN_REPAYMENT_TYPE , PRECEDING_TRADE_REFERENCE, SUCCESSDING_TRADE_REFERENCE, CNY_AMT, CARD_TYPE, CARD_TYPE_MEMO, CARD_NO, REPAY_NO_TYPE, REPAY_NO , NO_COUNTER_TYPE, NO_COUNTER_NO, BANK_PAYINS_CODE from aml_datasource inner join aml_analysisresult on aml_analysisresult.ref_no = aml_datasource.ref_no
and AML_ANALYSISRESULT.WORK_DATE like #{WORK_DATE} + '%'
order by aml_datasource.WORK_DATE DESC
